SEARCH

Package com.financial

package com.financial
The core root package of the FinDet application.

This package serves as the foundation of the software, containing the primary entry points, bootstrap logic, and main application lifecycle management. It acts as the parent namespace for all specialized modules including data models, statistical engines, and the UI layer.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.financial.data
    Provides the data layer components for the financial application, focusing on data ingestion and persistence.
    com.financial.entries
    Contains the core data models for the budget management system.
    com.financial.multi_year_analysis
    Provides the core data models and classes for managing and analyzing multi-year financial data and budget structures.
    com.financial.pdf
    Provides functionality for exporting financial data and reports to PDF format.
    com.financial.services
    The central service layer of the application, orchestrating financial logic across all budget sectors.
    com.financial.statistical_analysis
    Provides statistical analysis tools for financial budget data.
    com.financial.strategies
    Orchestrates the execution of BudgetExpense adjustments using the Strategy design pattern.
    com.financial.ui
    Provides the base user interface components and global styling for the application.

    Description

    The root package of the FinDet application.
